basics.name: Michael Loremia
basics.label: Frontend Developer
basics.summary: My name is Michael, I've been working on web development since 2012. From creating simple pages in php to building rich web application used by clients and users from different parts of the world.

work.summary: Develop and maintain vlocity hybrid mobile platform using AngularJS and Ionic 1

Incharge of managing tasks, architecture and features lists for developers from web to android and IOS, along with collaborations with design team for product features and collaboration for overall product architecture.
highlights: Created schema and parser for UI components consumed by web and mobile applicationg for generating rich UI.

work.summary: Developed web app called Aginstinct. Implementing map based functionalities for farms using data visualization and google maps API
highlights: Implemented map based visualizations based on on site data.
Implemented interactive drawing to map out properties of farms.

work.summary: Develop web apps and hybrid applications for clients.
highlights: Started the move to angularJS from Backbone.js
Helped with Conceptualizing and refining features of apps for clients based on user needs and demands
Created radio streaming platform for mobile 'RCI radio' using angularJS and Ionic
